channel.title: Need help modifying this program i've wrote please help this is due tomarow plz
channel.description:
hey guys i got the coding done u can help me with otehr stuff in there casue i got it done where the user enter item then the price and tax calculate i want it the bill to print in a diffrent window also when i enter item it should be able to get its price and user should be able to enter more than one item. please some one make it like that for me i done most of the coding please help me also it would be good if i can use these same code and use GUI *Please Help* also i want the bill printed like This ex:
apple $1.50 orage $2.00 pinaple $5.00 ------------ Total $8.00 tax $1.20 ------------ Total $9.20

item.title: Need help modifying this program i've wrote please help this is due tomarow plz
item.dc:creator: @iwasinmoparseas101cl iwasinmoparseas101class
item.description:
@iwasinmoparseas101cl wrote:

SETO, to print the bill ot a different place or file just do this (assuming you are writing ASCII instead of Binary):

try{
     File out = new File("bill.txt");
     FileOutputStream output = new FileOutPutStream(out);
     PrintWriter pw = new PrintWriter(output);
     
     for(int i=0; i<(array of items or what-have-you); i++){
           pw.println(i);
     }
     
    pw.close();
    output.close();
}
catch(Exception e){
    System.out.println();
}

hope that helps a bit.

Read full topic
